趆字的基本解释

趆
dī
小步快跑。

趆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dī］
［《廣韻》都奚切，平齊，端。］
［《廣韻》都計切，去霽，端。］
亦作“赿2”。
(1)快走。
(2)用于人名。《明史·楚昭王桢传》有宗人华趆。

趆字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【走字部】　趆； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1216第16
【廣韻】都奚切【集韻】都黎切，?音低。【說文】趨也。【玉篇】走貌。　又【廣韻】都計切【集韻】丁計切，?音帝。又【集韻】典禮切，音邸。義?同。　【篇海】或作?。

趆字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
趆字的起名意思

暂无。

Jian
Basic explanation of words
Jian
dī
Run in small steps.
Jian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dī］
["Guang Yun" are all cut, flush, and end. ]
["Guangyun" all plan to cut, go to Ji, end. ]
Also known as "赿2".
(1) Go fast.
(2) Used for names. "The History of the Ming Dynasty · Chu Zhao Wangzhen Biography" has a ancestor Hua Qian.
Jian

[Unitary Collection] [Zhou Zi Department] 　趆; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1216-16
[Guangyun] Du Xiqie [Jiyun] Du Liqie, low sound. [Said Wen] Trend too. [Jade articles] Take a look.　[Guangyun] All Jiqie【Jiyun】Ding Jiqie,? Yindi. Also [Jiyun] Ceremony cut, sound residence. Righteous? Same.　【Pianhai】Or make?.
